thread.title: Pleased Customer
thread.title_full: Grand Home Furnishings reviewed by Pleased Customer

author: Pleased Customer
title: Pleased Customer
text:
Very friendly staff, helpful saleswoman. She went out of her way to assist me. I am happy with my new furniture, and the delivery was prompt, and it arrived with no damage.
Overall pleased. I however gave four stars instead of five because while I had immense attention and guidance from a great salesperson, I didn't have the opportunity to walk around and casually browse.
